modName: Unbelievable Grass Two Lakeview Manor Patch
summary: This updated grass clipping fix.esp resolves the misaligned BYOHHouse1Exterior02 cell.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=6]What is this?[/size][/b]

[i]This is a quick patch to fix a neglected terrain issue with lakeview manor and Unbelievable Grass Two.[/i]

Unbelievable Grass Two can be found here:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67478/

Simply install UG2 and then disable its grass clipping fix.esp.
Install this mod, and enable the grass clipping fix.esp that is packaged in this mod.
Make sure that grass clipping esp comes after Unbelievable Grass Two in your load order.

[size=2][b]Does this mod work with XYZ? [/b][/size]

If the mod edits the landscape of BYOHHouse1Exterior02, then the answer is no. No it is not.

[b][size=3]This mod is as is. I am not open to updating, or adding more features or fixes. This ESP is solely just a modified version of AceeQ's with some extra fixes. It does not contain any extra falmer, dragons, etc. Any random acts of pancakes during your game play are solely your fault. If [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5678513]AceeQ[/url] fixes this issue in his own mod or creates his own patch please notify me I will remove this patch.[/size][/b]
author: VenHatred
